---
title: "pulling tables"
format: html
---


```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

url <- "https://www.iweblists.com/us/commerce/MarketCapitalization.html"

top_comp <- url %>% 
    read_html() %>% 
    html_table() %>% 
    pluck(1)

names(top_comp) <- top_comp[1, ]
top_comp <- top_comp %>% 
    slice(-1)

write.csv(top_comp, "streamlit_app/top_companies.csv")
```
